content:
What a great idea! Booking a private room at a nearby restaurant is a fantastic way to continue the celebration and enjoy a delicious meal together. I'd be happy to recommend some restaurants in the Santa Ynez Valley that can accommodate a group of 10 people and offer a wine-friendly menu. Here are a few options to consider:

1. **The Los Olivos Cafe**: Located in the charming town of Los Olivos, this cafe serves up delicious California cuisine with a focus on local ingredients and wine pairing. They have a private room that can accommodate up to 12 people and offer a customized menu for groups.
2. **The Ballard Inn & Restaurant**: This historic inn and restaurant in Ballard offers a private dining room that can seat up to 12 people. Their menu features farm-to-table cuisine with a focus on local wines and ingredients.
3. **Root 246**: Located in Solvang, Root 246 offers a private dining room that can accommodate up to 12 people. Their menu features contemporary American cuisine with a focus on seasonal ingredients and creative wine pairings.
4. **The Gathering Table**: This farm-to-table restaurant in Santa Ynez offers a private dining room that can seat up to 12 people. Their menu features locally sourced ingredients and creative wine pairings.
5. **Mad & Vin**: Located in Solvang, Mad & Vin offers a private dining room that can accommodate up to 12 people. Their menu features modern American cuisine with a focus on wine pairing and seasonal ingredients.

All of these restaurants are highly rated and well-loved in the Santa Ynez Valley. Be sure to book your private room and menu in advance, as they can fill up quickly, especially during peak season.

When booking, be sure to ask about their wine list and wine pairing options. Many of these restaurants have extensive wine lists featuring local Santa Ynez Valley wines, which would be a great way to continue the wine theme from your vineyard tour and tasting.

Enjoy your dinner celebration!
